name: The Curse Of The Cemetery
description:
KENNEY GAME JAM 2020 THEME

Cursed

STORY
Zombie in your town cemetery, you knew that.
But you did not know all : cemetery is cursed.
Only one living human can move at the same time

GOAL
You and your friend have to go out of the  alive

CONTROL
SPACE   - Call zombies to watch your friend back
E - Change focus to control the other character
ARROW  - Move character  ( works also with  ZQSD, OR WASD )
